Overview

The Ashaway ABS511 Seattle Court Shoe is suitable for both squash and badminton.

The shoe is designed and built to be lightweight. with breathable materials throughout.
The weight of the shoe has been reduced by 25% compared with other footwear in the Ashaway range and as much as 35% when compared to other shoes on the market.

 

Specification:

  • Upper composition - EVA with FeatherLite Breathable Mesh Inserts 
  • Midsole composition - Antibacterial and hi-shock middle layer 
  • Outsole composition- Wet Grip Rubber 
  • Heel Stability - PVC Heel Counter 

Multi-Breathable top layer, perforated EVA mixed with breathable fibres
EVA Hi Shape retention sole
FeatherLite Design.
